text: @SenRonJohnson @CDCgov The Administration downplayed the seriousness of the Coronavirus, by limiting testing & discouraging the reporting of positive cases. We need scientists & health officials to be in charge of this crisis, not self-interested politicians like Trump. MORE TESTING!
